data.title: The 11 big trades of 2025: Bubbles, cockroaches and a 367% jump
data.description: From bond desks in Tokyo and credit committees in New York to currency traders in Istanbul, markets delivered both windfalls and whiplash
data.content:
It was another year of high-conviction bets  and fast reversals.
